name: Physical Training
text:
[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [willpower] for this skill test.
[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [combat] for this skill test.

name: Dynamite Blast
text: Choose either your location or a connecting location. Deal 3 damage to each enemy and to each investigator at the chosen location. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity.

name: Hyperawareness
text:
[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [intellect] for this skill test.
[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [agility] for this skill test.

name: Barricade
text:
Attach to your location.
Non-[[elite]] enemies cannot move into or spawn at attached location. Anytime an enemy would spawn at attached location, spawn it at a connecting location instead, if able.
Forced - When an investigator leaves attached location: Discard Barricade.

name: Hard Knocks
text:
[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [combat] for this skill test.
[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [agility] for this skill test.

flavor: “I win again! Sorry sugar, it’s just not your night.”
name: Hot Streak
Arcane Studies
text:
[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [willpower] for this skill test.
[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [intellect] for this skill test.

name: Mind Wipe
text:
Fast. Play after a phase begins.
Choose a non-[[elite]] enemy in your location. Until the end of the round, reduce the chosen enemy's damage and horror values by 1, and treat its printed text box as if it were blank (except for [[traits]]).

name: Dig Deep
text:
[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [willpower] for this skill test.
[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [agility] for this skill test.

flavor: They claimed it would bring me good luck. I wouldn’t say that’s true. But now I feel like it would be even worse luck to get rid of it.
name: Rabbit's Foot
text: After you fail a skill test, exhaust Rabbit's Foot: Search the top X cards of your deck for a card, draw it, and shuffle the remaining cards into your deck. X is the amount you failed by.
